version_description:
Hey ABA 同学们,

有新的版本来啦！

- 提高app的稳定性，带给你更好的学习体验.
- 解决常见的app故障.

记得哦，我们期待着收到你的反馈(还要好好学英语哦！)

Hey ABA 同学们,

有新的版本来啦！

- 提高app的稳定性，带给你更好的学习体验.
- 解决常见的app故障， 小的改善让app表现更好.

快去更新吧！
记得哦，我们期待着收到你的反馈！

Hey ABA Students:

In this new version we have:

- Done a few small improvements to improve stability and performance
- Fixed commonly reported bugs

Go ahead and update!

We love your feedback so keep it coming. (And keep studying lots of English!)

ABA Students!

In this new version we have:

- Fixed commonly reported bugs
- Made general improvements to make your experience better

We love your feedback so keep it coming. (And keep studying lots of English!

Hi, ABA Students!

Our jewel in the crown has arrived, the ultimate activity so you no longer have to say "I don't speak English". Let us introduce our new feature, hot off the press for you all, ABAmoments!
ABAmoments are short activities in English containing topics regarding daily life which you will receive five days a week. The best thing of all is that you will learn how to speak, listen, read and write thanks to the activities’ vocabulary, sound and images.

We have thought of everything and we know that you are very busy so ABAmoments won’t take up more than 6 minutes a day of your time, that is to say, you can practise English while you heat up your lunch in the microwave or wait for your friends in a bar. It will be very easy for you to get in the habit of doing them. We promise you will like them and are sure that they will help you be brave enough to go to the hairdresser’s and explain what haircut you want in English .

We are always happy to hear your opinions. As you know, sharing is caring!

Hi ABA Students!

We've prepared a new version of our app full of new features:

-The Speak, Interpret, and Vocabulary sections have been revised. Now you'll advance automatically when you finish each recording.
-We've added new Feedback screens at the end of each section and unit.
-We've fixed some minor bugs.

Have fun learning with ABA English!

Hi, ABA Students!

We have created a very special new version of our app which is full of new features:

-The "Speak", "Interpret" and "Vocabulary" sections have been redesigned. Now it is much easier to record your voice and compare it to the native speakers!
-We have added a Level Test so that you know exactly what your level of English is before starting the course. You will therefore start at the perfect unit for you.
-Lastly, we have included several improvements so that our app works properly with iOS 11 and iPhone X.

Have fun studying with ABA English!

-The Speak, Interpret, and Vocabulary sections have been revised. Now you'll advance automatically when you finish each recording.
-We've added new Feedback screens at the end of each section and unit.
-We've fixed some minor bugs.

Have fun learning with ABA English!

Hi ABA Students!
 
We've prepared a new version of our app that's full of new features: 
 
-Enjoy the new Unit 1! It's specially designed to use on mobile devices and includes the following: 
New ABA Film
New Videoclass
New vocabulary exercise

-Presenting a brand new ABAmoment… Awesome People! If you are a Premium Student, you can also practice your English by reading biographies of celebrities such as Emma Watson or Paulo Coelho.
 
Enjoy learning with ABA English!

Hi, ABA Students!

We have prepared a new version of our app including a very exciting surprise... our brand new Tab Bar! This new navigation bar has allowed us to improve our course by introducing a lot of new things:

-Improved browsing through the different sections.
-More visibility for all the sections
-More visibility for new content.

Have fun studying with ABA English!

Hi ABA Students!

The latest version of our app includes a new unit menu design.

Now it will be much easier to browse the course and view the units you have completed and those that you still have left to do.

Have fun while learning with ABA English!

[NEW] Learning English has never been so easy! Recently we presented the mind-blowing feature - Live English. Have you had the chance to try it? We will continue giving the app a complete makeover! This version we made the most entertaining parts more eye-catchy: ABA Films and Video Classes. Imagine a place where you can learn English while only watching and listening. Does it exist? Yes, with ABA English you can actually learn while enjoying. Stay tuned! More surprises are coming...
Learning English gives you fantastic opportunities and it is your chance to communicate confidently around the world. Study regularly and you'll feel constant progress.

Assessment is the most important part of learning. This is when you are aware of what you have accomplished and what you need to learn. Remember to take the final test of every unit. It will be very helpful!

The first step to acquire a new language is to listen to it, just as babies do when they are born. This is why all units start with an ABA Film. Watch them as many times as you need and you will develop your comprehension skills.

"This is a very special version for ABA English!

We are pleased to present our new image and our new logo, representing ABA English’s goal: to be your Digital English Academy!

Have fun learning with ABA English!"

[NEW] We are proud to introduce you to (drum roll) Live English! You must be wondering what it is. We are now adding engaging new content daily, specially designed for you. We want to keep you motivated with new exercises, vocabulary, podcasts, videos and more exciting learning material. Don't forget to check out the content from Oxford University. Stay curious, keep learning English and achieve your dreams!

We want to keep you motivated with new exercises, vocabulary, podcasts, videos and more exciting learning material. Don't forget to check out the content from Oxford University. Stay curious, keep learning English and achieve your dreams!

[NEW] We can't keep quiet any longer! We have given the speaking section in the app a complete makeover. Now learning English will be even easier. But it doesn't stop there. We are happy to present our brand-new feature (drum roll)... Live English. Discover it now, but be warned: it's addictive! Keep an eye out for more new features, keep learning English and achieve your dreams!

We're continuing to give the app a complete makeover. What's coming next is incredible and the course will be even more adapted to your learning needs. Don't forget to check out all our engaging articles in Live English. Once you start, you won't be able to stop. Before you know it, you'll have learned several new words and expressions. ABA students, stay tuned! There are more surprises to come and you won't be disappointed.

Hi! We've been working very hard to put together some new features for you. Open the app and you'll see the surprises we have in store for you! You'll now have a "Today" tab which will guide you every day throughout your learning process. Live English has totally changed its design and you'll notice that all the content is tailored to fit your needs and interests. Stay curious, keep learning English and achieve your dreams!

Hi! We've been working very hard to put together some new features for you. Open the app and you'll see the surprises we have in store for you! You'll now have a "Today" tab which will guide you every day throughout your learning process. Live English has totally changed its design and you'll notice that all the content is tailored to fit your needs and interests. Stay curious, keep learning English and achieve your dreams!

Get ready to take your English writing skills to the next level! No need to dwell on the past. The app team has worked tooth and nail to bring you this version which includes a new elegant design in the writing section. Check it out today. It might be the best thing since sliced bread.

Get ready to take your English writing skills to the next level! No need to dwell on the past. The app team has worked tooth and nail to bring you this version which includes a new elegant design in the writing section. Check it out today. It might be the best thing since sliced bread.

There are so many updates and changes that we don't know what to tell you first. This is the most radical and powerful change we have made so far. We are launching a new way to learn English. Now, at ABA English, you will learn English with what you like. You will find articles, podcasts and videos with topics of your interest and, we are adapting it all to your level of English. Discover new and original content every day. It's all created for you.

You can now earn points every time you complete a microlesson. That way, you'll be able to see how much you've been practising. And as you know, the more you practise, the more you'll learn. Check out all the new things we have in store for you and improve your English with the Smart Learning® method.

You can now earn points every time you complete a microlesson. That way, you'll be able to see how much you've been practising. And as you know, the more you practise, the more you'll learn. Check out all the new things we have in store for you and improve your English with the Smart Learning® method.

Make the most of your time at home. Practise English for a few minutes each day and see results in no time.

To help you start seeing results, we’ll offer you:
... new and personalised content every day
... free speaking sessions where you can interact with other students
... you’ll find a new section: “Discover”, where you can easily access the content that interests you most
... you can set yourself a Weekly Goal and keep on top of your progress.

We're continuing to add improvements to help you with your routine and progress. Discover the Daily Plan. A custom-made plan including exercises that will help you successfully improve. With this set of guided practice suggestions, you’ll know which activities you need to do each day. The plan includes 3 quick exercises and 1 course activity. It’ll be over and done within 15 minutes!

In the new guided course, you'll never feel like you don't know where you're up to or don’t know what to do. You’ll be able to clearly see which activity you need to do to keep moving through the course. You’ll also see a progress bar that shows what you’ve done and what you still need to do to complete the level. With a good routine, you’ll be able to get your Certificate in 3 months.

While you’re improving your English, we’re improving the app. We’re working hard to make sure everything runs to perfection. Even the fussiest of our teachers has given his approval! So, don’t wait another minute, come and get practising. The app is on hand to help your English level take off!

We present our "Message your Teacher" feature: your new communication channel with your teacher. From this section, you will be able to write as many messages as you want to solve any doubts you might have about the language or our methodology. You will also be able to download the Student Guide and the Study Plan, which will help you build your study routine.
